title: Ticket #4668: Identify minimal build
description:
It would be nifty to have documentation that assume you're starting with a minimally installed Debian or Red Hat system and shows the most straightforward route to building HTCondor. This would include a list of packages to install for each platform, and options to pass to cmake to turn off as many features as possible. ("cmake -LA" will list options)

This would also be a good opportunity to discover which features seem like they can be turned off, but actually break the build. Those should be identified and either fixed so we can build/run without them, or removed as build options.

This is probably pretty straightforward work and might be a good introduction to building HTCondor, so it might be a good STUDENTTASK. 

../CONDOR_SRC/configure_uw
	-DCLIPPED:BOOL=ON
	-DHAVE_BACKFILL:BOOL=OFF
	-DHAVE_BOINC:BOOL=OFF
	-DHAVE_HIBERNATION:BOOL=OFF
	-DHAVE_KBDD:BOOL=OFF
	-DHAVE_SHARED_PORT:BOOL=OFF
	-DHAVE_SSH_TO_JOB:BOOL=OFF
	-DWANT_GLEXEC:BOOL=OFF
	-DWANT_LEASE_MANAGER:BOOL=OFF
	-DWANT_MAN_PAGES:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_BLAHP:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_BOINC:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_BOSCO:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_CAMPUSFACTORY:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_COREDUMPER:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_CREAM:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_CURL:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_GANGLIA:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_GLOBUS:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_GSOAP:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_LIBCGROUP:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_LIBDELTACLOUD:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_LIBVIRT:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_LIBXML2:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_PYTHON_BINDINGS:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_UNICOREGAHP:BOOL=OFF
	-DWITH_VOMS:BOOL=OFF
	../CONDOR_SRC


# This used to work; now breaks
	-DWITH_KRB5:BOOL=OFF
remarks:
2014-Oct-21 15:50:42 by adesmet:
CmakeBuildOptions is a good place to make notes on options; I've flagged two that I know cannot actually be disabled (WITH_OPENSSL and HAVE_JOB_HOOKS).

2014-Nov-18 17:16:29 by adesmet:
